page.title: 18SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: {School Games} Some of te games we play at school ar3 rounders, cricket, high low swing, dolly pepper choice, marbles, hop scotch and catch. We play Fairies and Witches. This is where someone swings the rope round and round and others try to jump it. We shout fairies and witches. If your foot catches it when we shout witches you are a witch and also you are on. The same goes for fairies. Another of our favourite games is bad eggs. To play you need four or more players standing in a circle. One person with a ball walks behind the others and drops the ball behind someone. He or she then runs around the circle. The nearest member in the circle gets the ball and it it is thrown from player to player around the circle. If the ball beats the runner the player tries again.
